title: LSTM-Based Automated Instructional Design: Short-Term Intensive Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theories and VR simulation experience
context.additional_context: Social studies vocational training conducted in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can derive at least three learning outcomes tailored to educational model characteristics using an LSTM-based system.
Learners can apply an automated instructional design process with over 80% accuracy in a simulation/VR environment.
Learners can operate an automated instructional design solution in a constrained technological environment (smartphone) tailored to corporate training contexts.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
